channel.description: Recent content in hugo on lost in tab

item.title: Create a static site with Hugo and GitHub pages
item.description: As I mentioned in my first post, much of my resistance to blogging has been a blend of prefectionism and an abhorrence to any chance of having to deal with yet more infrastructure issue. That is, I deal with broken crap at my day job; I really don’t want to have to worry about that for my blog. In that vein, I pursued the simplest practical stack with the quickest startup time, ending up with a static site generated with Hugo hosted as a GitHub page.
